casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2013-1534. Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. v. Horn.

Lorain App. No. 12CA010230, 2013-Ohio-2374. Reported in 137 Ohio St.3d 1473, 2014-Ohio-176, 2 N.E.3d 268. On motion for reconsideration. Motion granted as to Proposition of Law No. I. The discretionary appeal is accepted on Proposition of Law No. I.

French, J., would grant the motion as to both Propositions of Law. Pfeifer, Lanzinger, and O’Neill, JJ., dissent.
